column4: I'm trying to install the package "asterisk-app-fax" that is supposedly in universe (http://packages.ubuntu.com/hardy/asterisk-app-fax).  I'm running server 10.04.2.  i have universe enabled in my sources list.  any idea why i can't find it?
Your link is for hardy, you're on Lucid?
ahh. well, i totally missed that.
